Control Statement: The requirements of paragraphs (a)(2)(i) and (a)(2)(ii) of this section apply to the contract or other arrangement between a business associate and a subcontractor required by 164.308(b)(4) in the same manner as such requirements apply to contracts or other arrangements between a covered entity and business associate.
